title: Enchanting 'Pooja' Diamond Jhumka Earrings with South Sea Pearl
materials: Round Brilliant Cut Blue Stone. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: These exquisite earrings feature a graceful floral design, meticulously handcrafted with prong-set diamonds and colored sapphires. The design cascades down from a floral motif at the top to a cluster of pearls, creating a sense of movement and brilliance. The openwork design showcases the intricate setting of each gemstone, enhancing its natural beauty. Features a modern aesthetic that still draws inspiration from traditional south indian floral motifs.
colors: Blue and White South Sea Pearls.
occasions: and cocktail parties. These earrings are also suitable for modern celebrations and cultural gatherings.
description: These stunning Jhumka earrings are a unique blend of traditional elegance and contemporary style. The dazzling combination of rose gold, diamonds, and colored sapphires creates a truly eye-catching piece. The South Sea Pearl adds a touch of classic luxury. Exquisitely crafted by our skilled artisans, this piece will become a cherished heirloom.
